name: 羅文偉
objective: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
schedule:
1.　　Heat tramfer by conduction
2.　　Principles of heat flow in fluids
3.　　Heat transfer to fluids without phase charge
4.　　Heat transfer to fluids with phase charge
5.　　Radition heat transfer
materials: McCabe, W. L., Smith, J. C. & Harriott, P., “Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering”, 7th ed., McGraw-Hill Co., 2005.
